We have gone through your requirement, We recommend utilizing an API connection to transfer a specific amount of data to HubSpot daily. To achieve this, you can develop a custom solution or can use Zapier that retrieves data from the data source and sends it to HubSpot on a daily basis. This can be implemented as an External Cron service, ensuring regular data updates. Upon successful data transfer, the custom solution can update the desired property in HubSpot. Subsequently, based on the property update, you can trigger workflows to create tasks or send automated emails, as per the desired flow.
